definition: Yongbyon (Ryeongbyeon), site of North Korean nuclear reactor
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: Yongbyon is approximately 60 miles [96 kilometers] north of the capital at Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 寧邊位於北韓首都平壤以北約96公里處。

sentences.english: The disruption of the Shensi-Kansu-Ningsia Border Region was part of their plot.
sentences.chinese: 陝甘寧邊區，是這種陰謀的一部分。

sentences.english: It has also destroyed the cooling tower at its reactor at Yongbyon.
sentences.chinese: 北韓還炸燬了寧邊核反應堆的冷卻塔。

sentences.english: North Korea responded by reversing earlier steps it took to disable its primary nuclear facility at Yongbyon.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，北韓停止了先前拆除寧邊核設施的工作。

sentences.english: North Korea has been building a light-water reactor at its main Yongbyon nuclear complex since last year.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮自去年起就在寧邊核設施建造一座輕水反應堆。

sentences.english: Before the Anti-Japanese War , there almost had no modern industry in the region.
sentences.chinese: 抗戰前陝甘寧邊區幾乎沒有近代工業。

sentences.english: North Korean officials also demolished the cooling tower at the country's Yongbyon nuclear reactor.
sentences.chinese: 另外，北韓還炸燬了寧邊核設施的冷卻塔。

sentences.english: North Korea had shut down its nuclear reactor in Yongbyon in July.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮已經在去年七月關閉了其在寧邊的核反應堆。

sentences.english: North Korea's nuclear program began with the installation of a Soviet reactor in Yongbyon.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮的核計劃，始於蘇聯在寧邊建設核反應堆。
